sqlGroup.name: follower
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT `follower`.*,`user`.username username,`user`.email email, `user`.last_name last_name,`user`.full_name full_name,`user`.mobile mobile, `userInfo`.street street,`userInfo`.gender gender, `userInfo`.zip_code zip_code,`province`.name province,`city`.name city,`county`.name county

FROM follower `follower` LEFT JOIN sec_user `user` ON(`follower`.link_id=`user`.id) LEFT JOIN sec_user_info `userInfo` ON(`user`.id=`userInfo`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `province` ON(`userInfo`.province_id=`province`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `city` ON(`userInfo`.city_id=`city`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `county` ON(`userInfo`.county_id=`county`.id)

FROM follower `follower` LEFT JOIN sec_user `user` ON(`follower`.user_id=`user`.id) LEFT JOIN sec_user_info `userInfo` ON(`user`.id=`userInfo`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `province` ON(`userInfo`.province_id=`province`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `city` ON(`userInfo`.city_id=`city`.id) LEFT JOIN com_area `county` ON(`userInfo`.county_id=`county`.id)

sqlGroup.name: blog
sqlGroup.sql: FROM blog `blog` LEFT JOIN sec_user `user` ON(`blog`.user_id=`user`.id) LEFT JOIN department `department` ON(`user`.department_id=`department`.id)
